answers.answer: Hi,How long you have been having diabetes?Was diabetic gastroparesis diagnosed?

I don't know how long I have had diabetes II, I started on pills maybe in 1996. There was no name like Gert or Gastroparesis.  A Doctor shoved a pipe down my throatand looked at my ? What he said sounded like something  like a "cut" in my esophagus that let acid comeup into my esophagus.  I learned over 2 years, anytime I ate Roast Beef or tomatoe Juice, that place wouldclose up and keep water from going into my stomach, after a few minutes, it would openback up.

question: After I was put on insulin for my Diabetes II, I lost any burning, pain, chest pain, wastold could be my diabetic neuro nerve endings have died???? Could this be true?
title: Sudden loss of Acid Reflux
